name: Otome Reality [Demo]
description:
Hello, Chaesan here! Otome Reality is a solo project that I have been wanting to make for quite some time! Character art, CGs, GUI art, and programming were done by me, but everything else was from lovely free-to-use resources which you can see in the 'About' portion of the game. 

To help improve the game, would greatly appreciate it if you could complete this survey and/or answer the following questions below: https://forms.gle/3NFNkMUSwHmjLj6L6
  • Favorite love interest so far and why?
  • Do you enjoy MC's personality and interaction with the characters?
  • What do you think of the story so far?
  • Overall feedback?
